terms_and_conditions.terms_paragraph_1: Welcome to ~Clorio, your gateway to the Mina Protocol currency. It's essential to recognize that, when using this service, you become the sole custodian of your private keys. With this authority comes significant responsibility ‚Äì the duty to safeguard your keys diligently. Under no circumstances should you ever disclose your private key to anyone. For enhanced security, we strongly recommend using a hardware wallet.
terms_and_conditions.terms_paragraph_2: By choosing to utilize ~Clorio, you acknowledge that you are assuming full responsibility for any potential losses. Please note that our wallet is open source. We encourage you to thoroughly review the source code before employing this software and even consider running your infrastructure. Your feedback is invaluable ‚Äì kindly report any issues you encounter on
terms_and_conditions.terms_paragraph_3: When you opt for the ~Clorio Wallet, you are also agreeing to our
terms_and_conditions.terms_paragraph_4: . It is crucial to understand that no party can be held liable for any software bugs or security concerns that may arise.Your use of this service implies your acceptance of these terms and your commitment to exercising due diligence in safeguarding your assets.
